mapper.select: select CAST(seq AS char(10)) as seq ,content ,CAST(date_format(reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS char(100)) as reg_date ,reg_user ,title from board
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (content, del_date, del_yn, mod_date, reg_date, reg_user, title) VALUES(#{content}, NULL, 'N', NULL, #{reg_date}, #{reg_user}, #{title})
